name: 300. Farmers. Godot Engine game.
description:
The famous story of the abduction of russian tanks by Ukrainian farmers.

This game allows you to collect abandoned or destroyed tanks and transport them to the scrap yard. All tanks over 10 double their points. Controls - arrows and\or swipe, sound muting - klick to M key.

Glory to Ukraine!

Assets paсk "Top-down Tanks Redux" from Kenney https://www.kenney.nl/assets/topdown-tanks-redux

I found the music in my collection of free samples, if you are the copyright holder of this music, please contact me personally.
